description: Binary Hadamard Matrix self-Similarity of the Pascal triangle type used to give characteristic polynomials as a triangular sequence: 1, 1 - x, -1 - x + x^2, 1 + 3 x + x^2 - x^3, 1 - x - 4 x^2 - x^3 +x^4, -1 - x + 6 x^2 + 8 x^3 + x^4 - x^5, -1 + 3 x + 6 x^2 - 7 x^3 - 10 x^4 - x^5 + x^6.
